name: Dragon Raid
description:
Instructions: Press 1 to shoot a fireball breath.

Press Enter when at the cave to deposit your gold.

Coding, SFX, and Village Sprite: https://rebelliousrobot.itch.io/

Most Art (Dragon, Castle, and Cave) : https://renington1100.itch.io/

BGM: Thatched Villagers by Kevin Macleod: https://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/music.html

"Thatched Villagers" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
